html:
Earnings Call Insights: e.l.f. Beauty (NYSE:ELF) Q3 2025

Management View

  • CEO Tarang Amin highlighted e.l.f. Beauty's consistent growth, with Q3 marking the 24th consecutive quarter of net sales growth and market share gains. Net sales grew 31%, adjusted EBITDA reached $69 million, and U.S. market share increased
